snippet: The government approved the 30-foot tower, shaped like a Christmas tree, in a move that is likely to anger North Korea.
abstract: South Korea approves construction of 30-foot tower shaped like Christmas tree near border with North Korea, move that is likely to antagonize the North; tower will be built by conservative Christian group.
lead_paragraph: The government approved the 30-foot tower, shaped like a Christmas tree, in a move that is likely to anger North Korea.

headline.main: South Korea Allows New Christmas Tower at Border With North
headline.print_headline: South Korea Allows New Christmas Tower at Border With North
